titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 2000) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1995 through 1998 to carry out the Head Start Act and the Community Services Block Grant Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-502, by Mr. Hall (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 2000. Upon the adoption of this resolution it shall be in order to consider the conference report on S. 2000. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 155.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/11/1994--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 2000 (authorizing appropriations for FY 1995 through 1998 to carry out the Head Start Act and the Community Services Block Grant Act).
